recipe.title: Red-Wine Vinaigrette
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Whisk the vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt and pepper together in a small bowl. Whisking constantly, add the oil in a slow, steady stream and continue whisking until thickened.
